pkgmetadata.longdescription: This metapackage provides various Monte Carlo libraries included in Cernlib (both shared and static). Likely only physicists will be interested in these packages. The libraries of Ariadne, Fritiof, Jetset, Lepto, and Pythia are not available for Gentoo: see cernlib Debian packaging for explanation.
